K10n206u_001:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe virahati sma |
K10n206u_001:3: sarvatraidhātukaprativiśiṣṭa nirvikalpadharmadhātugarbhe prāsāde mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ mahatā ca bodhisatvasaṃghena |
K10n206u_001:4: tad yathā avikalpena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena |
K10n206u_001:18: ) tatra khalu bhagavā(n anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto)
K10n206u_001:22: atha khalu bhagavān asamantāṃ sarvāvatīṃ bodhisattvaparṣadam avalokya bodhisattvān āmantrayate sma |
K10n206u_001:23: dhārayata yūyaṃ kulaputrā avikalpapraveśāṃ nāma dhāraṇīṃ yām avikalpapraveśāṃ dhāraṇīṃ dhārayan bodhisattvo ma(hāsattvo buddhadharmān laghulaghu saṃpādayati ya)
K10n206u_001:26: atha tasyām eva parṣady avikalpaparabhāso nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ |
K10n206u_001:27: sa utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇañ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛhivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat
K10n206u_001:34: tenai hi kulaputrāḥ śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasukuru ( |)
K10n206u_001:40: iha kulaputrā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vikalpādhipateyaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvāvikalpam āśyaṃ sanniveśya sarvavikalpanimittāni parivarjayati |
K10n206u_001:42: yad uta grāhyaṃ vā grāhakaṃ vā |
K10n206u_001:43: tatredaṃ) prakṛtivikalpanimittaṃ yat sāsrave vastuni nimittaṃ |
K10n206u_001:54: tasya tāni kramaśo vikalpanimittāni parivarjayataḥ tadanyāni pratipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpanimittāni samudācaranty āmukhībhavanty ābhāsakaraṇayogena
K10n206u_001:64: sa tāny api pratipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpanimittāny amanasikārataḥ parivarjayati |
K10n206u_001:66: tasya tāni pari varjayataḥ tadanyāni tattvanirūpaṇavikalpanimittāni samudācaranty āmukhībhavanty ābhāsagamanayogena |
K10n206u_001:77: tasya tāny api parivarjayato 'parāṇi prāptinirūpaṇavikalpanimittāni samudācaranty āmukhībhavanty ābhāsagamanayogena |
K10n206u_001:86: | yad uta svalakṣaṇanirūpaṇato vā guṇanirūpaṇato vā sāranirūpaṇato vā |
K10n206u_001:87: sa tāny api prāptinirūpaṇavikalpanimittāny amanasikārataḥ parivarjayati |
K10n206u_001:89: evaṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattva etāni sarvākāravikalpanimittāny amanasikārataḥ parivarjayan suprayukto havaty avikalpena |
K10n206u_001:90: na ca tāvad avikalpaṃ dhātuṃ spṛśati ( |
K10n206u_001:93: sa tasya samyakprayogasya bhāvanānvayād bahulīkaraṇānvayāt samyaṅmanasikārānvayād anabhisaṃskārād anābhogato vāvikalpaṃ dhātuṃ sṛśati |
K10n206u_001:96: kena kāraṇena kulaputrā avikalpadhātur avikalpa ity ucyate |
K10n206u_001:108: avikalpadhātupratiṣṭhito hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñeyanirviśiṣṭena nirvikalpena jñānenākāśasamatalān sarvadharmān paśyati |
K10n206u_001:118: tad yathā kulaputrā ekaghanasāramayasya pāṣāṇaparvatasyādhastān mahānānāratnaparipūrṇanidhiḥ syād ( |)
K10n206u_001:138: tadutkhanatas te nānāratnapratibhāsaṃ pāṣāṇa(m ābhāsam āgamiṣyet |
K10n206u_001:142: evaṃ hi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa suprayuktas tadutkhanito 'bhisaṃskāram antareṇāprayatnenaiva mahācintāmaṇiratnanidhānaṃ drakṣyasi |
K10n206u_001:143: tasya ca mahāratnanidhānasya pratilambhāt tvam āḍhyo bhaviṣyasi |
K10n206u_001:149: adhastān mahācintāmaṇiratnanidhānam ity avikalpadhātor etad adhivacanaṃ |)
K10n206u_001:151: mahāratnanidhānābhijñāḥ puruṣa iti tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaitad adhivacanaṃ |
K10n206u_001:156: rūpyapratibhāsaṃ pāṣāṇam iti pratipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpanimittānām etad adhivacanaṃ |
K10n206u_001:157: suvarṇapratibhāsaṃ pāṣāṇam iti śūnyatādivikalpanimittānām etad adhivacanaṃ |
K10n206u_001:160: mahācintāmaṇiratnanidhānasya pratilaṃbha ity avikalpadhātusparśanāyā etad adhivacanaṃ ( |)
K10n206u_001:163: kathaṃ punaḥ kulaputrā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etāni yathānirdiṣṭāni vikalpanimittāni vyupaparī(kṣamāṇo 'vikalpadhātuṃ praviśati |
K10n206u_001:164: iha kula)putrā avikalpadhātupratiṣṭhito bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ rūpaprakṛtivikalpanimitta āmukhībhūta evaṃ vyupaparīkṣate |
K10n206u_001:165: yo mama rūpam iti carati vikalpe carati |
K10n206u_001:166: pareṣāṃ rūpaṃ iti carati vikalpe carati |
K10n206u_001:167: rūpam idam iti carati vikalpe carati |
K10n206u_001:173: nāsti rūpam iti carati vikalpe carati |
K10n206u_001:178: yogato 'pi nāsti vṛttito 'pi nāsti rūpam iti carati vikalpe carati |
K10n206u_001:179: vijñptimātraṃ rūpaṃ iti carati vikalpe carati |
K10n206u_001:180: yathā (rūpaṃ nāsti tathā rūpapratibhāsā vijñaptir api nā)
K10n206u_001:183: yataś ca kulaputrā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpam iti nopalabhate |
K10n206u_001:185: na ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ vijñaptiṃ vipariṇāśayati |
K10n206u_001:188: tasyāś ca rūpapratibhāsāyā vijñapter abhāvaṃ tayā vijñaptyā naikatvena samanupaśyati |
K10n206u_001:193: sarvākāraiḥ sarvavikalpair yo na vikalpayaty aya(m avikalpadhātur iti na samanupaśyati |
K10n206u_001:202: iha kulaputrāḥ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatānirūpaṇavikalpanimitta āmukhībhūta evaṃ vyupaparīkṣate |
K10n206u_001:203: yo mama sarvākārajñateti carati vikalpe carati |
K10n206u_001:206: sarvākarajñatā prāpyata iti carati vikalpe carati |
K10n206u_001:208: sarvākārajñatāyā nānyat traidhātukaṃ vyavadānād iti carati vikalpe carati |
K10n206u_001:220: vṛttito 'pi nāsti sarvākārajñateti carati vikalpe carati |
K10n206u_001:223: sā vijñaptir api nāstīti carati vikalpe carati |
K10n206u_001:225: yataś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathaiva sarvākārajñatān nopalabhate |
K10n206u_001:227: na ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ tadvijñaptiṃ vipraṇāśayati |
K10n206u_001:228: na cānyatra tadvijñapter anyaṃ kañcid dharmam upalabhate |
K10n206u_001:229: abhā(vataś ca tāṃ vijñaptiṃ na samanupaśyati |
K10n206u_001:235: na ca tasyā vijñapter abhāvaṃ bhāvataḥ samanupaśyatu |
K10n206u_001:237: ebhiḥ kulaputrāḥ sarvākāraiḥ sarvavikalpair yo na vika(lpayaty ayam avikalpadharmadhātur iti na samanupaśyati |)
K10n206u_001:239: evaṃ hi kulaputrā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vikalpadhātupratiṣṭito bhavati |
K10n206u_001:241: (asya kulaputrā dharmaparyāyasya udgrahaṇalekhanavācanād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ nanv eva gaṅgānadīvālukopamātmabhāvaparityāgasya nanve eva gaṃgānadīvālukopamalokādhātuparipūrṇaratnadānasya nanv eva gaṃgānadīvālukopamalpkadhātuparipūrṇatathāgatabiṃbakārāpaṇapuṇyaskandhasyeti |)
K10n206u_001:243: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ ime gāthe abhāṣata ||
K10n206u_001:249: idam avocad bahgavān āttamanā avikalpaprabhāsaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti ||
